description.en: Country-born Mikoto and student council member Ren have always spent their time after school together. But one day, that ordinary routine suddenly comes to an end… With Uchouten High School as the stage, the love and youth of these impressionable young girls is about to begin!
description.pt-br:
Mikoto, nascida no interior, e Ren, membro do conselho estudantil, sempre passam o tempo juntas depois da escola. 
  Mas um dia, essa rotina normal chega subitamente ao fim... 
Com a escola Uchouten como palco, o amor e a juventude destas jovens impressionáveis ​​estão prestes a começar!

description.en:
With everyone's memories having been altered, Boruto finds himself being hunted by his own village. After escaping with Sasuke, what future awaits Boruto...?

(Source: MangaPlus)

---

**Links:**
- [Viz - Alternative Official English](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/boruto-two-blue-vortex)
description.es:
La memoria colectiva de la gente ha cambiado, y ahora la Villa de la Hoja va detrás de la vida de Boruto. Pese a las adversidades, alguien ha estado esperando junto a Sasuke después de abandonar la Villa.

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.fr: Les « souvenirs » des gens ont changé et désormais, la vie de Boruto est menacée au village caché de Konoha. La situation est telle que Boruto quitte le village avec Sasuke sans savoir ce qui les attend…
description.id:
Sesuatu telah mengubah "memori" para warga. Boruto yang kini menjadi buron melarikan diri dari Konoha bersama Sasuke. Di tengah konflik itu, yang telah menanti keduanya adalah...

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.th:
"ความทรงจำ" ของผู้คนเปลี่ยนไป ทำให้โบรุโตะต้องตกอยู่ในฐานะที่โดนหมู่บ้านโคโนะฮะงาคุเระหมายชีวิต ท่ามกลางเคราะห์ร้ายที่ประสบ สิ่งที่รอคอยโบรุโตะซึ่งหนีออกจากหมู่บ้านไปพร้อมๆ กับซาสึเกะก็คือ...

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br: As "memórias" das pessoas foram alteradas e Boruto está numa posição onde a Vila Oculta da Folha quer tomar a sua vida. Durante essa adversidade, o que Boruto aguardava quando deixou a vila com o Sasuke era...

title.en: Kimi ni Todoke: From Me to You

description.en:
Sawako Kuronuma is the perfect heroine… for a horror movie. With her jet-black hair, sinister smile and silent demeanor, she's often mistaken for the haunting movie character Sadako. But behind her scary facade is a very misunderstood teenager. Too shy to fit in, all she wants to do is make some friends. But when a popular boy in class befriends her, she's sure to make more than just that–she's about to make some enemies too!  
  
---
- **Won the 32nd Kodansha Manga Award for Shojo in 2008**

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Kimi ni Todoke: From Me To You** (2014)

altTitles.en: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest

altTitles.th: อาชีพกระจอกแล้วทำไม ยังไงข้าก็เทพ

altTitles.ja: ありふれた職業で世界最強

altTitles.zh: 平凡职业成就世界最强

altTitles.es-la: El más fuerte del mundo en una profesión mundana

altTitles.vi: Arifureta - Từ tầm thường đến bất khả chiến bại

altTitles.de: Arifureta - Der Kampf zurück in meine Welt

description.en:
Among the class transported to another world, Nagumo Hajime is an ordinary male student who didn’t have ambition nor aspiration in life, and thus called “Incompetent” by his classmates.
The class was summoned to become heroes and save a country from destruction. Students of the class were blessed with cheat specifications and cool job class, however, it was not the case with Hajime, with his profession as a “Synergist”, and his very mediocre stats. “Synergist”, to put it in another word was just artisan class. Being the weakest, he then falls to the depth of the abyss when he and his classmates were exploring a dungeon. What did he find in the depth of the abyss, and can he survive?


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
description.fr:
Le quotidien de l’étudiant ordinaire qu’est Hajime Nagumo, dont la vie ne se comporte que de nuits blanches et siestes en cours, se retrouve bouleversé lorsque sa classe et lui se retrouvent transportés en tant qu’héros dans un autre monde afin de le sauver… Alors que tout le monde obtient des jobs assez puissants, notre héros se retrouve avec le job « Synergiste », assez inutile en l’état des choses, humilié et jeté seul dans les tréfonds d’un donjon, arrivera-t-il à survivre ?


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
description.it:
Tra gli studenti trasportati in un altro mondo, Nagumo Hajime è uno studente senza ambizioni ed aspirazioni nella vita, è infatti soprannominato l’Incapace dai suoi compagni.
Gli studenti sono stati evocati per ergersi ad eroi e salvare il paese dalla distruzione. A loro sono stati donati poteri e classi di livello, a tutti tranne che a Nagumo Hajime, che inizia da Sinergista con statistiche mediocri.
Il Sinergista, è in altre parole un “crafter”. Essendo il più debole, finisce per cadere nelle profondità di un abisso durante l'esplorazione di un sotterraneo. 
Cosa troverà nelle profondità dell’abisso... e riuscirà a sopravvivere?
description.pl:
Wśród uczniów klasy przeniesionej do innego świata, Hajime Nagumo niczym się nie wyróżnia; ot najzwyklejszy w świecie uczeń niemający ambicji czy życiowego celu, dlatego też nazywany w klasie "Nieudacznikiem".
Gdy cała klasa trafiła do innego świata, by zostać bohaterami i ocalić cały kraj przed zniszczeniem, wszyscy zostali pobłogosławieni oszukańczymi statystykami i świetnymi profesjami… za wyjątkiem Hajime, który skończył z profesją "Synergetyka" i przeciętnymi statystykami. "Synergetyk", ujmując to inaczej, jest zwyczajną klasą rzemieślniczą. Będąc najsłabszym w klasie, spada w głąb otchłani podczas wspólnego eksplorowania lochu. Czego dowiedział się w jej czeluściach i czy uda mu się przetrwać?


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
description.ru:
Хадзимэ Нагумо, живущий по принципу «Первым делом - хобби», и весь его класс вдруг призывают в другой мир. Одноклассники один за другим открывают невероятные по меркам этого мира способности, ну а Хадзимэ достается бесполезный ремесленный класс «Синергист». Оказавшись в самых глубинах преисподней, он находит применения своему заурядному таланту и стремится найти выход из лабиринта…  


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
description.es-la:
Entre la clase transportada a otro mundo, Nagumo Hajime es un estudiante normal y corriente que no tiene ambiciones ni aspiraciones en la vida, por lo que sus compañeros le llaman "Incompetente".
La clase fue convocada para convertirse en héroes y salvar a un país de la destrucción. Los estudiantes de la clase fueron bendecidos con habilidades tramposas y una categoría de trabajo genial, sin embargo, no fue el caso de Hajime, con su profesión de "Sinergista", y sus estadísticas muy mediocres. "Sinergista", para decirlo en otra palabra era simplemente la clase artesanal. Siendo el más débil, entonces cae a la profundidad del abismo cuando él y sus compañeros estaban explorando una mazmorra. ¿Qué encontró en la profundidad del abismo, y podrá sobrevivir?
description.pt-br: Entre a turma transportada para outro mundo, Nagumo Hajime é um estudante do sexo masculino comum que não tem ambição nem aspiração na vida, e, portanto, chamado de " incompetente" por seus colegas. A classe foi convocada para se tornar heróis e salvar um país da destruição. Os alunos da classe foram abençoados com as especificações de trapaça e classes legais, no entanto, não foi o caso com Hajime , com a sua profissão como um " Synergist " , e suas estatísticas muito medíocres. "Synergist", para colocá-lo em outras palavrsa era apenas a classe dos artesãos. Sendo o mais fraco , então ele cai para a profundidade do abismo , quando ele e seus colegas estavam explorando uma dungeon. O que ele encontra na profundidade do abismo, e ele pode sobreviver?

title.en: Song of the Sky Walkers (Long Strip)

description.en:
In the midst of an auspicious sign from the heavens, the emperor’s family gave birth to a special pair of twins—a male born with a forehead mole the colour of cinnabar, and a female born with six fingers. However, this brother and sister pair is cruelly separated by fate! One is taken eastward to celestial Penglai, to embark on the long road of cultivation. The other is abandoned in the reeds, to travel alongside an old swordsman through the mortal realm… As fate advances, how will the two fight destiny? Will they be able to reunite?

---

**Note:** This is the **long strip** version of [Song of the Sky Pacers](https://mangadex.org/title/a7120845-476e-4f54-9a95-f92cbd592176)
description.zh: 异象天光中，帝王家诞生一对特殊的双生龙凤胎，男婴额带朱砂痣，女婴长有六指。然而，这对血脉相连的兄妹却被命运残忍分开！一个被蓬莱仙长携走，踏上漫漫修仙路，一个被弃于芦苇荡，跟随老剑客在红尘中跋涉……天劫将至，二人将如何与天命相争？又会以何种方式重逢？

description.en: The story is about Jisuwon, a typical high school freshman with a talent for drawing. He falls for a girl who is already taken, but then meets Seolhyorim, the most beautiful girl in school, and falls for her instantly. He draws pictures of her secretly, but they are discovered by Yang Jinsu and revealed to Seolhyorim. Can Suwon's second first love be maintained?

title.en: A Cool Older Lady Who Drives Me Crazy

altTitles.ja: 僕を狂わすカッコイイお姉さん

altTitles.en: A Cool Older Lady That Makes Me Crazy

altTitles.pt-br: Uma mulher mais velha legal que me deixa louco

altTitles.es-la: Una mujer mayor genial que me vuelve loco

title.en: Koori no Hime wa Chiisana Hidamari de Tokasaretai

altTitles.ja: 氷の姫は小さな陽だまりでとかされたい

altTitles.en: The Ice Princess Wants to Be Melted by a Small Patch of Sunlight

description.en: Aoba is a first-year high school student who takes care of his younger siblings in place of his busy parents, and ends up at a sibling playdate in the home of his classmate Mizudori, a cool beauty known as the "Ice Princess".
description.ja:
多忙な両親に代わり、保育園児の弟妹を世話する男子高校生の青葉実晴は、恋愛をする暇はないが、弟妹と楽しく過ごしていた。ある日、クラスメートで「氷の姫様」と呼ばれるクール美女・水鳥雪の自宅で遊ぶことになった青葉は、「私を笑顔にしてくれませんか？」と水鳥に頼まれて…！？ 

幼い弟妹を大切に想う高校生たちの青春ラブコメ開幕！

title.en: "Mou.... Hatarakitakunaindesu" Boukensha Nanka Yamete yaru. Imasara, Taiguu wo Kaerukara to Onegai sarete mo Okotowaridesu. Boku wa Zettai Hatarakimasen.

altTitles.ja: 『もう‥‥働きたくないんです』冒険者なんか辞めてやる。今更、待遇を変えるからとお願いされてもお断りです。僕はぜーったい働きません。

altTitles.en: I... Don't Want to Work Anymore. I Quit Being an Adventurer For Good and You Can't Stop Me.

altTitles.es-la: "Yo... no quiero trabajar más" Dejé de ser un aventurero. Aunque me traten mejor ahora, no lo haré. No volveré a trabajar.

altTitles.th: 「เบื่อ… ไม่อยากทำงานแล้วครับ」นักผจญภัยอะไรนั่นไม่เอาด้วยแล้ว จะเปลี่ยนเงื่อนไขการทำงานให้ก็ขอปฏิเสธ ผมน่ะจะไม่ทำงานอีกต่อไปแล้ววว

altTitles.ko: ″이제… 일하고 싶지 않습니다″ 이제 와서 잘해줄 테니 돌아오라고 해도 거절합니다.

altTitles.ru: Я авантюрист который не хочет работать

altTitles.id: "Aku... Tidak Akan Bekerja" Aku Berhenti Jadi Petualang. Bahkan Jika Diperlakukan Lebih Baik, Tetap Tidak Akan. Aku Tidak Akan Bekerja lagi

description.en: Ex, an E-rank adventurer, makes a decision one day after five years of slaving away at the guild. "I'm quitting this job!" Ex was belittled for only being able to use beginner magic, but as it turns out, it had a special trait... Even if people threaten him or ask him to do anything, it's too late for them. "I'm neeeever gonna work anymore!"
description.ja: 元Ｅ級冒険者のエクス１９歳。才能の全てを“効果時間延長”に特化した異才の魔導師は、５年間、年中無休で奴隷のように働く毎日を過ごしてきた。ついに過労で倒れてしまい、玄関先で目を覚ましたある日、ようやく自分の心と向き合う。「こんな仕事、辞めてやるっ！」冒険者を辞めたエクスは、もう働かないことを宣言。これまでエクスの効果時間が異常に長い初級魔法の恩恵を享受してきた連中は、彼の代わりなど誰もいないことに気づいて慌てふためくが、もう遅い。脅してきても、すがりついてきても、ニッコリ笑って全部お断り。「僕はもう、ぜーったい働きません！」働かない宣言わした初級魔導師の新しい生活が、今はじまる！
description.es-la:
Aix es un aventurero de rango E de 19 años. Es un mago "prodigio" que se especializa únicamente en la "Extensión de la duración de los efectos". Ha pasado los últimos cinco años trabajando como un esclavo durante todas la semanas. Cuando por fin se derrumba por el cansancio y se despierta en la puerta de su casa, por fin se reconcilia consigo mismo. "¡Voy a dejar este trabajo!" Tras dejar su trabajo como aventurero, Aix anuncia que no trabajará más. La gente que había estado disfrutando de los beneficios de la magia de novato de duración inusual de Aix, entró en pánico cuando se dio cuenta de que no había nadie para reemplazarlo, pero era demasiado tarde. Sonrió y rechazó todas las amenazas e intentos de forzarlo a trabajar. "¡Nunca volveré a trabajar!" 

¡La nueva vida de un mago novato que se dijo así mismo que no trabajará comienza ahora!

description.en: In a world where peoples' names grant them superhuman powers... Two agents from the Nordic Naming Bureau(NNB), an agency specialized in investigating crimes committed by "Namers", handle the case of a man and his missing wife and son. Things take a turn, however, when the duo come face to face with the man, who wishes to give his son the same name as himself...

altTitles.en: Finding Avalon: The Quest of a Chaosbringer

altTitles.ja: 災悪のアヴァロン～ゲーム最弱の悪役デブに転移したけど、俺だけ“やせれば強くてニューゲーム”な世界だったので、最速レベルアップ＆破滅フラグ回避で影の英雄を目指します～

description.en:
The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dan-Ex. During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it.
In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server.
Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!

altTitles.ja: ディスコミュニケーション

description.en: "Why do people fall in love?" Arika Togawa doesn't understand why she has fallen in love with her classmate, Takaomi Matsubue, as she hardly knows him. Together they decide to find out how two strangers can fall in love, encountering other wonderful but strange love stories along the way. Religious, occult, and popular iconography figure prominently in this "Truly Mysterious Love Manga."

There was someone who set out after receiving orders from the Absolute One who first unified the continent to learn the secret of immortality. He believed that he would definitely discover the secret of immortality even if he had to travel all over the world. He never returned until the Absolute died and the empire collapsed, leaving behind only numerous speculations and gradually being forgotten in people's memories. And after a long time...
description.ru:
От создателя знаменитой манхвы «Мастер»! 
 
Могучий правитель, объединивший континент, послал своего самого отважного воина на поиски секрета бессмертия. Правитель был уверен, что тайна бессмертия будет раскрыта, даже если придётся искать её по всему миру. Однако... тот так и не вернулся. Правитель скончался. Империя пала. О воине ещё долго говорили, но со временем люди начали забывать и его. И вот, спустя многие годы...

title.en: Kimi Shi ni Tamafu Koto Nakare

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi Shi ni Tamafu Koto Nakare

altTitles.en: You Must Not Give Yourself to Death

altTitles.ja: 君死ニタマフ事ナカレ

description.en: In the future, supernatural powers not only exist but have become science fact. The “Special Abilities Private High School” is established in order to utilize students’ powers for the military. Students are roped onto the battlefield without knowing the meaning of the fight, whether it will save their lives…or spell their demise.
description.pt-br: No futuro, poderes sobrenaturais não apenas existem, como também se tornaram fatos científicos. O "Colégio Particular de Habilidades Especiais" foi criado para que esses poderes fossem utilizados para o exército. Estudantes são jogados no campo de batalha sem saber o porquê de estarem lutando, se isso salvará suas vidas... ou acabará com elas.

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

altTitles.en: How to Love a Useless Person

altTitles.vi: Bí Quyết Để Yêu Một Tên Vô Dụng

description.en:
"No talent, no money, no education. A worthless person, bottom of the barrel."
"But... just seeing you like that makes me feel so happy."
Shinba, an unemployed young man, is what someone could call a useless person.
For some reason, such a man is dating a cool and beautiful woman named Hizumi.

For the sake of Hizumi, whom he loves very much, Shinba tries to graduate from being a useless person, but his efforts are always in vain.

She ridicule, sneers and deny him. She whisper words of love to him and stays by his side.

An imbalanced love story, presented by a useless man and a devilish girlfriend, open its curtains to the world.
description.pt-br:
"Sem talento, sem dinheiro, sem educação. Uma pessoa sem valor, no fundo do poço."
"Mas... só de te ver assim me faz tão feliz."
Shinba, um jovem desempregado, é o que alguém poderia chamar de uma pessoa inútil.
Por algum motivo, esse homem está namorando uma mulher legal e bonita chamada Hizumi.

Pelo bem de Hizumi, a quem ele ama muito, Shinba tenta se formar como uma pessoa útil, mas seus esforços são sempre em vão.

Ela ridiculariza, zomba e o nega. Sussurra palavras de amor para ele e fica ao seu lado.

Uma história de amor desequilibrada, apresentada por um homem inútil e uma namorada diabólica, abre suas cortinas para o mundo.

description.en:
The latest series by Hiro Mashima is a Demon World Academy Dark Fantasy!!
DEAD ROCK is a demon king training institution that towers over the depths of the demon world.
Yakuto, a young demon, challenges the harsh entrance exam to knock on the doors of DEAD ROCK!!
description.fr: DEAD ROCK se déroule au sein de l'académie sombre et fantastique du même nom, un institut d'entraînement pour les rois démons qui gouvernent les abysses du monde des démons. C'est là que Yakuto, un jeune résident du monde des démons, se lance dans le défi des examens d'admission.
description.ja:
デッドロック、それは魔界の深層にそびえたつ魔王養成機関。
魔界人の若者であるヤクトは、デッドロックの門戸をたたくため、過酷な入学試験に挑む!!

description.en:
A world in which Korea is the global capital of combat sports. At Nam-Il High School where the best and most talented students of martial arts reside, Jiu Ji-Tae suddenly finds himself thrust into their midst despite being a total weakling.  
  
By neutralizing his physical shortcomings through jiu-jitsu, can he rise to the top of the fight classes?  


---
description.fr:
Un monde dans lequel la Corée est le Pays leader des sports de combats. Au lycée Nam-il où les meilleurs et plus talentueux élèves en arts martiaux étudient, Jiu Ji-tae se trouve soudainement entraîné avec eux alors qu'il n'est qu'un faiblard.  
  
En faisant disparaître ses défauts physiques à l'aide du Ju-Jitsu, pourra-t-il devenir le meilleur des classes de combat ?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/mymmx89)
description.pt-br:
Em um mundo onde a Coréia do Sul é a capital mundial dos esportes de combate, o Colégio Namil é onde os melhores e mais talentosos estudantes de artes marciais competem, e nosso protagonista Jiu Jitei se encontra subitamente em meio à eles mesmo sendo um fracote completo.
  
Superando suas fraquezas com jiu-jitsu, será que Jitei consegue chegar ao topo das turmas de luta?

altTitles.vi: Dũng giả gục ngã và Công chúa sát thủ

altTitles.en: The Fainting Hero and the Assassin Princesses

description.en: Toto is a novice hero who has finally put together the team that he'd always wanted. And he's ready to set out on a new adventure. But Toto's new party members' actual target is... his life?!

altTitles.ja: 天使禁猟区-東京クロノス-

description.en: The manga takes place after the story of Tenshi Kinryouku, but it is an independent work.

altTitles.vi: Dõi Theo Màn Đêm Trong Em

description.en:
Lu Renjia, an intern teacher, joins Onion Academy.

On the day of her employment, her childhood friend and elder brother, Wu Qi, suddenly goes missing.

While searching for Wu Qi, she gradually discovers another soul residing in her body...

Who are they? And who am I? As she unravels the mystery of herself, she is fortunate to have companions from the academy fighting alongside her, confronting conspiracies, and revealing cruel hidden truths.

title.en: Boku no Tsuma wa Kanjou ga Nai

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku no Tsuma ha Kanjou ga Nai

description.en: A story about the humble marriage of a corporate slave salaryman and a housework robot.

On the moon, there is an advance civilization of bunny people who used to be identical to humans, but after incorporating themselves with bunny genes, transformed into docile creatures. The result is a society where AI are entrusted with all choices, from the content of meals to how each minute of leisure time should be spent. Amongst this society is a bunny girl named Uko who dislikes this lifestyle, complaining "Let me choose for myself!!". One day, Uko decides to flee the moon and head to Earth where she meets Hane, a bunny girl investigating life on Earth. On this planet with many strange customs, these two will...!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Sake to Oni wa Nigou made
Sake to Onna wa Ni-gō made

description.en:
Shida Naori is a college student who loves making alcoholic drinks but has no friends to share them with. At a mixer, she meets Ibuki Hinata, who she ends up taking home with her. After making her a drink, Naori discovers that Hinata is an ogre-girl descended from Shuten-doji who needs alcohol to live, can only drink alcohol offered to her by humans, and grows horns whenever she drinks. Thus, Hinata decides to make Naori her personal bartender.

---

Alternative [Amazon Retail Link](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4757574061) (Physical)

title.en: Destiny Unchain Online ~Kyuuketsu-ki Shoujo to natte, Yagate『Aka no Maou』to Yobareru You ni Narimashita~

altTitles.ja: Destiny Unchain Online 〜吸血鬼少女となって、やがて『赤の魔王』と呼ばれるようになりました〜

altTitles.en: Destiny Unchain Online: After Becoming a Vampire Girl, I Eventually Became Known as "Crimson Demon King"

altTitles.th: Destiny Unchain Online เดสทินี อันเชน ออนไลน์ ~เมื่อผมกลายเป็นสาวน้อยผีดูดเลือดแล้วถูกขนานนามว่าจอมมารสีชาด~

altTitles.zh: Destiny Unchain Online 〜成为吸血鬼少女，不久后被称为『红之魔王』〜

altTitles.ko: Destiny Unchain Online 데스티니 언체인 온라인 〜흡혈귀 소녀가 되어, 이윽고『붉은 마왕』이라 불리게 되었습니다〜

description.en: Mitsuki Kou is such a feared PVP gamer that he's earned the nickname "Crim the Headhunter" in some circles. His next game to take over? "Destiny Unchain Online", a brand new VRMMO game developed by none other than Kou's father. But, no new game on release day is without its bugs - namely, Kou glitches to the middle of nowhere, and his vampire avatar is turned into a girl!  A story for all of the people who through games have met new friends and aimed for the top... start!
description.id: Mitsuki kou, seorang gamer dengan skill hebat yang memiliki nama lain,  yaitu "pemburu kepala Cream". Berpartisipasi dalam sebuah game baru "Destiny Unchain Online" yang dibuat oleh ayahnya sebagai tester perangkat game baru, tetapi segera setelah dimulai, karena sebuah bug ia menjadi gadis vampir. Ketika ia bertemu dengan teman-teman yang baik, pada saat itulah ia akan mulai menyelesaikan game, sebuah cerita tentang seorang gamer terbaik yang segala sesuatunya berubah…… sudah di mulai!
description.ja: 神がかったプレイヤースキルを持ち「首狩りクリム」の二つ名で知られるゲーマー、満月紅。父親が作った新作ゲーム『Destiny Unchain Online』に新型ゲームデバイスのテスターとして参加するが、開始早々バグだらけで姿は吸血鬼種族の少女に。最高の仲間と出会い、ゲームを攻略して行くうちに、何もかもが変わっていく最高のゲーマー物語……開幕！
description.ko: 압도적인 스킬을 가지고「목 사냥꾼 크림」이라는 별명으로 알려진 게이머, 미츠키 코우. 아버지가 만든 신작 게임 『Destiny Unchain Online』에 신형 게임 장치 테스터로 참가하지만, 시작하자마자 오류투성이로 흡혈귀 종족의 소녀가 되어 버리는데. 최고의 동료와 만나고, 게임을 공략해 나가다 보니,모든 것이 변해 가는 최강 게이머 이야기… 개막!
description.th: มิตสึกิ โค เกมเมอร์ฝีมือฉกาจที่รู้จักกันในนาม ‘คริมนักล่าหัว’ ได้เริ่มเล่นเกม ‘Destiny Unchain Online’ ที่พ่อของเขาสร้างในฐานะเทสเตอร์ของเครื่องเล่นเกมรุ่นใหม่ล่าสุด แต่ไม่ทันไรก็เจอบั๊กมากมายจนกลายเป็นเด็กสาวเผ่าผีดูดเลือดไปซะอย่างนั้น เรื่องราวของเกมเมอร์ผู้เก่งกาจที่ทุกอย่างเริ่มเปลี่ยนไปเมื่อได้พบกับพรรคพวกสุดเจ๋งและผจญภัยในโลกแห่งเกม... เปิดฉากแล้ว ณ บัดนี้!

description.en:
Collection of four stories about bullying and how people can react and survive it.  
1) The Final Loop  
2) And Then There Was You  
3) Watercolour Girl  
4) Gorbachev's Seed.
description.ru:
История 1 - Замкнутый круг

Если человеку причинили боль, имеет ли он право ранить других? И сможет ли месть вылечить разбитое сердце?

История 2 - А в конце был ты

Как объяснить другу детства, что он уже давно не просто друг, если от волнения голос просто отказывается служить? Но, возможно, действия важнее слов?

История 3 - Девушка цвета неба

Людям, выделяющимся из толпы, всегда приходится нелегко. И за то, чтобы остаться собой, иногда приходится платить самым дорогим. Так не лучше ли просто подстроиться под окружающих и жить спокойно?

История 4 - Семена Горбачёва

Стоит ли гоняться за мечтой, которую непременно растопчет жестокая реальность? Ведь если не питать надежд, не испытаешь и разочарования...

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

description.en:
A highly educated and wealthy elite who suffers from Haphephobia(fear of touching or of being touched) is forced by his grampa to work in the countryside for a few months if he wants to inherit the company. There he meets an ordinary, kind-hearted man.  
When the hot headed cat met the cheeky dog … what kind of sparks will it burst out?

A young priestess has formed her first adventuring party, but almost immediately they find themselves in distress. Luckily for her, the Goblin Slayer chose that place as his next killing grounds–a man who's dedicated his life to the extermination of all goblins, by any means necessary. And when rumors of his feats begin to circulate, there's no telling who might come calling next.  

**NOTE:**   
- There are *currently* no English scanlations of this manga. The chapters on the net are the official YenPress chapters.  
As long as they **(YenPress' chapters)** are in publication they are not allowed on MangaDex.  
  
**Links:**  
- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/GoblinSlayer_GA)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://ga.sbcr.jp/sp/goblin_slayer/)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://www.goblinslayer.jp/)
description.pt: Uma sacerdotisa formou seu primeiro grupo de aventureiros, mas, quase imediatamente se encontram em apuros pelos goblins. E o Goblin Slayer é quem vem ao resgate – um homem que tem dedicado sua vida a exterminação de todos os goblins, através de qualquer meio necessário.
description.ru: Юная жрица вместе со своей командой впервые отправилась на поиски приключений, но они тут же попали в беду. На помощь им приходит Убийца Гоблинов – таинственный мечник, посвятивший свою жизнь уничтожению всех гоблинов любыми средствами. В итоге девушка присоединяется к нему в постоянном походе против всевозможных пород гоблинов, в котором сталкивается с новыми тайнами, врагами, друзьями, а иногда и конкурентками.
description.pt-br: Um homem deseja tornar-se um “aventureiro”, cujo lema é: “Eu não vou salvar o mundo, eu apenas vou matar goblins.” Após ouvir rumores sobre ele, uma elfa se aproxima dele com um pedido.

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

description.en:
I was falsely accused of attempting to kill my younger sister, who was worshipped as a holy maiden. There was not a single person who believed in me, nor was there a person who stood up for me. Not even my blood-related family. I was fourteen years old, and it was winter. I, who was Edenbell's Fourth Princess, was miserably beheaded in front of the masses. After the end of my death, I awoke and what came was...

"My baby, my precious younger sister."

With a delightful smile, he held my small fingers. That warm gesture, warmth, and touch. He sang me a lullaby as he held me gently and swayed.

---
When Princess Alisa is framed for a terrible crime, she is shocked to learn that her own family wants her executed. After losing her will to live, she finds herself reborn as the princess of a rival empire. And though her new family acts sweet and kind on the surface, she's not sure they can be truly trusted. Luckily, with this new life comes new power. But what exactly is this mysterious magic that awakens in her? And more importantly, can she use it to get vengeance against those who once betrayed her?

---

description.fr:
Alyssa, la quatrième princesse d’Edenbell, est accusée à tort d’avoir tenté de tuer sa petite sœur. Condamnée froidement à mort par sa famille, elle se réincarne comme princesse de l’empire rival, Elmir. Dégoutée par la trahison de ses proches, elle jure de ne plus jamais aimer qui que ce soit. Mais l’empire d’Elmir est bien différent de celui d’Edenbell… Dans ce nouvel environnement, parviendra-t-elle à retrouver foi en l'humanité et à découvrir les terribles secrets qui entourent son exécution?

---
Personne n’a cru en moi, personne n’était là pour me soutenir, même ma propre famille. A ce moment-là, j’étais Alyssa, 4e princesse d’Edenbell. J’étais dans un état épouvantable et j’avais la gorge asséchée par la soif. J’ai regardé ma sœur cadette, espérant qu’elle les empêcherait de me tuer. Mais ce que j’ai vu sur son visage, c’était une expression d’extase, elle était heureuse d’assister à ma mort. Après avoir été exécutée, j’ai ouvert de nouveau mes yeux. J’étais dans le ventre de quelqu’un et je pouvais entendre des voix. Avant de retomber dans l’inconscience, j’ai entendues les paroles d’un petit garçon:

«Bienvenue, ma précieuse petite sœur,» il a ri chaleureusement, «Le monde entier t’aime.»

Je me suis réincarnée en tant que première princesse de l’empire Elmir, le rival de l’empire Edenbell!

---

description.id:
Aku dituduh mau membunuh adikku sendiri yang mendapat julukan sebagai saintess. Tidak ada seorang pun yang percaya denganku, dan tidak ada seorang pun yang melindungiku. Bahkan keluarga kandungku sendiri tidak mau mendengarkan penjelasanku sedikit pun. Pada akhirnya, aku yang merupakan putri ke-4 kekaisaran Edenberr mengakhiri hidupku dengan cara yang sadis pada usia 14 tahun. Setelah kehidupan pertamaku berakhir, saat aku membuka mata... "Sayang, adikku yang manis." Ada yang memanggilku dengan hangat. Dia memegang tanganku yang mungil sambil tersenyum. Aku bisa merasakan kehangatan darinya. Dia menggendongku sambil menyanyikan lagu tidur untukku.

description.it:
Quando la principessa Alicia viene incastrata per un terribile crimine, rimane scioccata nell'apprendere che la sua stessa famiglia vuole che sia giustiziata. Dopo aver perso la voglia di vivere, si ritrova a rinascere come la principessa di un impero rivale. E sebbene la sua nuova famiglia si comporti in modo dolce e gentile in superficie, non è sicura che ci si possa veramente fidare di loro. Fortunatamente, con questa nuova vita arriva un nuovo potere. Ma cos'è esattamente questa misteriosa magia che si risveglia in lei? E, cosa più importante, può usarla per vendicarsi di coloro che una volta l'hanno tradita?

---

description.ja:
イデンベル帝国の皇女アリサには腹違いの妹マリアンヌがいた。 金色の瞳を持ち誰からも愛される華やかな妹に対し、アリサは使用人にも冷遇を受けていた。 アリサがマリアンヌをお茶に招待した日、突然マリアンヌが血を吐き倒れる。 家族からも嫉妬したアリサが毒を入れたと決めつけられ、アリサは死刑になる。この濡れ衣はマリアンヌの陰謀だった。 もう人間には生まれ変わりたくないと神に願ったが、アリサはライバル国・エルミール帝国の皇女アイシャとして転生してしまう。 前世と正反対の愛情深い家族。特に腹違いの兄・イシスにやすらぎを感じ次第に心を開いて行く。 精霊使いの能力を持ち、賢く優しい少女へと成長するアイシャは、前世の残酷な記憶を乗り越え再び光の中で輝けるのか!?

description.ru:
Селена. Хранительница Империи. Богиня луны и мести... Неужели у меня не будет шанса отыскать справедливость и отомстить? Если так, то поскорее убейте меня. И прошу... Пускай впредь я больше никогда не появлюсь на свет человеком. Чтобы больше не сталкиваться с предательством. Чтобы избежать жизни, в которой ни единая живая душа тебя не любит. Чтобы больше не влачить жалкое существование.

Keď je princezná Alisa obvinená z hrozného zločinu, je šokovaná, keď sa dozvie, že jej vlastná rodina chce, aby ju popravili. Cíti sa porazená a ocitne sa znovuzrodená ako princezná znepriatelenej ríše. A hoci jej nová rodina pôsobí na povrchu milo a láskavo, nie je si istá, že sa im dá skutočne dôverovať. Našťastie s týmto novým životom prichádza nová sila. Ale čo presne je to tajomné kúzlo, ktoré sa v nej prebúdza? A čo je dôležitejšie, dokáže to využiť na pomstu tým, ktorí ju kedysi zradili?

title.en: Maou Gun Saikyou no Majutsushi wa Ningen datta

altTitles.en: The Maou Army's Strongest Magician Was a Human

altTitles.ru: Самый сильный волшебник армии Мао оказался человеком

altTitles.ja: 魔王軍最強の魔術師は人間だった

altTitles.zh-hk: 魔王軍最強的魔術師是人類

altTitles.en: The Strongest Magician in the Demon Lord's Army Was a Human

description.en: “Maou Army’s strongest magician” I’m called. Ike, a demon capable of capturing a fort alone. Clearing away enemies with immense magic, he is without a doubt a monster held in awe by friend and foe. However he has a secret he can’t tell other demons. “I, actually am a human you know.” Using modern knowledge to keep his secret, he became treated as a great commander and the driving force of the Maou’s army.

Yeren, who dreams of being a vampire hunter, is unwittingly caught in the crossfire between a vampire girl and the Holy lands. As a temporary blood servant, he doesn't know what to do when the hatred and strife between them have been ongoing for thousands of years… This is a story about Lilo·Ai, the last vampire.

altTitles.fr: Host Club - Le Lycée de la séduction

description.en: One day, Haruhi, a scholarship student at exclusive Ouran High School, breaks an $80,000 vase that belongs to the "Host Club," a mysterious campus group consisting of six super-rich (and gorgeous) guys. To pay back the damages, she is forced to work for the club, and it's there that she discovers just how wealthy the boys are and how different they are from everybody else. [Viz]
A collection of stories within the worlds of Revelations: Persona, Persona 2: Innocent Sin, and Persona 2: Eternal Punishment by Eri Takenashi!

altTitles.th: รันม่า ½ ไอ้หนุ่มกังฟู

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

Soun was disappointed to find that Ranma was a girl. However, when Ranma got out of the bath, he turned into a boy and the panda turned into Ranma's father, Genma. The two had fallen into a fountain during their training in China, a fountain that turned them into a woman and panda respectively when they touched the water. 

The Tendo family is initially in turmoil, including Akane, who has become a prospective bride, as they face the troublesome duo who go back and forth between man and woman, human and panda, although they can be restored to their original state if they are bathed in hot water. 

This is the first volume of a new edition of the popular manga.


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/ranma-1-2)
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
description.pt-br: Ranma Saotome foi treinado desde a infância até aos 16 anos. É estudante de artes marciais que, junto ao pai, Genma Saotome, fez uma jornada de treinamento nas Montanhas Bayan Har Shan, na Província de Qinghai, na China. Ali há o campo de treinamento chamado Jusenkyo onde existem diversas fontes amaldiçoadas. Cada uma delas está associada à história de alguém que morreu afogado há centenas ou milhares de anos e quem cair em uma delas transforma-se no ser que morreu afogado nela, seja ele humano ou não.  No meio do treinamento, Ranma e seu pai caem, cada um em uma fonte diferente, e acabam amaldiçoados. Depois desse incidente, toda vez que Ranma se molha com água fria, transforma-se em uma bela garota, enquanto seu pai em um enorme panda. Somente o banho com água quente pode reverter os personagens à sua forma original, ainda que temporariamente.

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

description.en: 29-year-old freeter Ikuta Hiroto is a carefree young man without a love life, regular job, or any real worries about the future. He inherits an old house from the neighbourhood granny, where his 18-year-old cousin, Natsumi moves in with him to study art in Tokyo. This is a story about Hiroto and the people around him who struggle with life.
description.ru: Двадцатидевятилетний работник на полставки Икута Хирото — беззаботный парень, у которого нет ни личной жизни, ни постоянной работы, ни каких-либо беспокойств о собственном будущем. В наследство от соседской бабушки ему достаётся старый дом, куда переезжает его восемнадцатилетняя двоюродная сестра Нацуми, чтобы учиться искусству в Токио. Это история о Хирото и окружающих его людях, которые борются с жизнью.
description.uk: 29-річний Ікута Хірото — безтурботний молодий чоловік без особистого життя, постійної роботи та реальних турбот про майбутнє. Він успадковує старий будинок від сусідської бабусі, куди переїжджає його 18-річна двоюрідна сестра Нацумі, щоб вивчати мистецтво в Токіо. Це історія про Хірото та людей навколо нього, які борються з життям.
description.pt-br: Ikuta Hiroto, de 29 anos, é um jovem despreocupado sem uma vida amorosa, emprego regular ou qualquer preocupação real com o futuro: um "freeter". Ele herda uma velha casa da avó do bairro, onde sua prima de 18 anos, Natsumi, vai morar com ele para estudar arte em Tóquio. Esta é uma história sobre Hiroto e as pessoas ao seu redor que lutam contra a vida.

title.en: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai

altTitles.ja: つれないほど青くて あざといくらいに赤い

altTitles.vi: Xanh đến nỗi Lạnh Lùng, Đỏ tới mức Xảo Quyệt

description.en: Is this senior... female? Male? Neutral? Demonic? A transfer student suffering from an incurable disease called curiosity meets a mysterious being (human) who is beautiful, cute, cool, and terrifying. The first of a new generation of horror comic authors presents an abyssal love story, a ghost story to peek into and sensuality to you.
description.ru:
Мой сэмпай... Кто же это? Девушка? Парень? Оно? Демон?.. Главный герой — переведенный ученик старшей школы, страдающий неизлечимым чувством любопытства натыкается на красивое, милое, крутое и опасное создание (человека?). С этого момента и начинаются их необычные отношения.

(Source: mangalib)
description.vi: Liệu senpai này là... Nữ giới? Nam giới? Vô giới? Ác quỷ giới?? Một học sinh chuyển trường mắc một căn bệnh vô phương cứu chữa gọi là sự hiếu kì đã gặp phải một tồn tại bí ẩn dưới hình dạng của một con người vô cùng xinh đẹp và dễ thương nhưng cũng rất lạnh lùng và đáng sợ. Một câu chuyện tình yêu nơi vực thẳm, một câu chuyện ma quái đầy gợi cảm, mang đến cho bạn bởi tác giả đứng đầu về một thế hệ mới của truyện kinh dị...!

description.en:
Humanity's dream…   
Crystal humanoid technology. They have 'illnesses' just like humans but the treatment options are quite different.  
  
The troubled AI's band together, and the new doctor at the facility, Sudou, bears witness.
description.pt-br:
O sonho da humanidade…
Tecnologia humanóide de cristal. Eles têm “doenças” assim como os humanos, mas as opções de tratamento são bem diferentes.

O conjunto da problemática IA e o novo médico da instalação, Sudou, são testemunhas

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.ja: 1mmでも図に乗った事がある元天才の君へ1万年に1人の天才魔女“ナユ”の魔力が枯れた！？天才ゆえに許されてきたあれやこれのツケが、今ブーメランのように突き刺さっていく…そんなナユが助けを求めたのは、自分のことが大好きな教え子の小麦くん。だいぶ痛いけどなんだか放って置けない奇妙な2人の共同生活が始まった！
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

description.en: Despite his athletic gifts, Ayasegawa Jiro is a loner who causes others to lose or give up on their dreams, all because of him. While struggling with his loneliness, he discovers the "Bambies," an uncompetitive baseball team whose motto is "having fun." Jiro finds joy in his baseball life with his teammates, but...This is a baseball youth drama that explores the relationship between a genius and his peers.

title.en: The Legendary Assassin Reincarnated as the Beloved Youngest Daughter of a Royal Family

altTitles.ja: 伝説の暗殺者、転生したら王家の愛され末娘になってしまいまして

altTitles.pt-br: Tire proveito da habilidade do assassino  Proteja sua família, amor.
Um assassino lendário, reencarnou e se tornou a filha mais nova da família real

altTitles.en: The Legendary Assassin Reincarnated as the Beloved Youngest Daughter of a Royal Family.

altTitles.ja-ro: Densetsu no Ansatsusha, Tensei Shitara Ouke no Aisare Suemusume ni Natte Shimaimashite

description.pt-br:
“Babu-babu-babu-babu-babu-babu!?”
 (Estou me transformando em um bebê!?)

 Thoth, um assassino considerado uma lenda no submundo, é vendido por seus pais ainda jovem e criado estritamente como um assassino, por isso não conhece o amor de sua família.  Por capricho, ela salva um gato e morre, mas depois de morrer, está prestes a ser condenada ao inferno por tirar a vida de muitas pessoas.  No entanto, devido à sua boa ação de salvar um gato, ela pode reencarnar e renascer como a princesa do reino, Patricia.  Então, Deus ordena que ele salve os membros da família real – sua família.
 Ele deveria ter renascido como um bebê indefeso, mas suas habilidades de assassino não diminuíram e ele continua a lutar contra assassinos um após o outro.

 Aos poucos, surge o sentimento de querer proteger os membros da família real, que os amam incondicionalmente só porque são da família...?

altTitles.pt-br: A filha de Satan é uma súcubo

altTitles.es-la: La hija de Satanás es una súcubo

description.es-la:
La historia se trata sobre la súcubo llamada Vanessa es la princesa del Infierno, su papá Satanás es el Gobernante del Infierno y su mamá Lilith la Reina de los Demonios.

Vanessa se pasaba el tiempo holgazaneando con videojuegos, así que Satanás se canso de su ociosa hija y la mando a cazar/drenar una alma humana...

Veamos la travesía que hará la sexy súcubo Vanessa para encontrar una alma humana siendo que es su 1ra vez y ya saben como obtienes las almas/energía las súcubos.

Sinopsis hecha por The Lonely Reader

description.en: Jang Gwangnam's life as he grows the guard tribe that protects the Kana-Shi city.

Garyou Hanagami is a veteran mangaka. Best known for the behemoth of a series that is Dragon Land, Hanagami-sensei has years of experience under his belt and is always thinking up new manga ideas. 

Shinobu Miyama is not. An amateur working for Hanagami-sensei as an assistant, Miyama is nicknamed “The Chameleon” for his ability to copy the artstyles of those he works under. However, his true dream is to escape the faceless crowds and become someone. 

So what happens when a work accident causes them to swap bodies?
description.fr:
Garyou Hanagami est un mangaka chevronné. Il est connu pour son oeuvre Dragon Land, le manga le plus populaire. Hanagami a des années d'expérience à son actif et déborde d'une créativité et d'une énergie folle.

Shinobu Miyama est un dessinateur travaillant pour Hanagami en tant qu'assistant libre. Miyama est surnommé "le caméléon" en raison de sa capacité à copier le style de n'importe quel artiste à la perfection. Cependant, son véritable rêve est de sortir de la masse et de devenir quelqu'un avec une grande renommée.

Suite a un accident, les deux mangaka échangent de corps. Garyou va maintenant devoir battre sa propre oeuvre, dans le corps d'un illustre inconnu.
Une bataille au sommet du manga commence ! 
Entre le dragon qui repart de zéro et le caméléon qui tente d'imiter cet animal céleste ! 

Qui va remporter le titre du meilleur mangaka ?!

title.en: My Friend's Little Sister Has It in for Me!

altTitles.en: My Friend's Little Sister is Annoying Only Towards Me

altTitles.id: Adik Perempuan Temanku Hanya Usil Kepadaku

altTitles.en: My Friend's Little Sister is Only Annoying to Me

altTitles.ru: Младшая сестрёнка моего друга пристает лишь ко мне

altTitles.ja: 友達の妹が俺にだけウザい

altTitles.ja-ro: Tomodachi no Imouto ga Ore ni Dake Uzai

altTitles.es-la: La hermana menor de mi mejor amigo solo es molesta conmigo

description.en:
I don’t need any deep relationships. I have no desire for a girlfriend, and I only require one friend who holds any value to me. Ever since I threw out my youth for the sake of efficiency, there is one person who keeps entering the bedroom of Ooboshi Akiteru. She’s neither my little sister nor my friend. She’s nothing more than a bothersome, annoying Kouhai, as well as my friend’s little sister: Kohinata Iroha. “Senpai, let’s go on a date~! Did you think I’d say that~?”. Rather than blood, it seems that energy drinks run through her veins. She keeps occupying my bed, and she tries her best to seduce me with whatever method she can play to her favor. She’s a girl who’s constantly annoying and obnoxious around me. Even though I’m busy all day long, she doesn’t care. And in case you’re wondering why all these envious gazes are directed at me, it’s because Iroha is actually really popular. She’s an honor student at our school with top grades to boot, and she’s known for being kind and proper to anyone she meets. …Hey now, why are you only so annoying when you’re around me?  

---

description.pt: Não preciso de nenhum relacionamento profundo. Não desejo uma namorada, e só preciso de um amigo que tenha algum valor para mim. Desde que eu, Ooboshi Akiteru, joguei fora minha juventude por uma questão de eficiência, há uma pessoa que continua entrando no meu quarto. Ela não é minha irmãzinha nem minha amiga. Ela não passa de uma Kouhai chata e irritante, além da irmã mais nova do meu amigo: Kohinata Iroha. "Senpai, vamos a um encontro ~! Você achou que eu diria isso ~?". Em vez de sangue, parece que bebidas energéticas correm por suas veias. Ela continua ocupando minha cama e tenta ao máximo me seduzir com qualquer método que ela possa jogar a seu favor. Ela é uma garota que é constantemente irritante e desagradável ao meu redor. Embora eu esteja ocupada o dia todo, ela não se importa. E caso você esteja se perguntando por que todos esses olhares invejosos são direcionados para mim, é porque Iroha é realmente muito popular. Ela é uma aluna de honra da nossa escola com as melhores notas e é conhecida por ser gentil e adequada com qualquer pessoa que conhece. …Ei agora, por que você é tão irritante quando está perto de mim?
description.ru: Мне не нужны никакие глубокие отношения. У меня нет желания иметь подругу, и мне нужен только один друг, который имеет для меня хоть какую-то ценность. С тех пор как я бросил свою молодость ради эффективности, есть один человек, который продолжает входить в спальню Ообоши Акитеру. Она мне не младшая сестра и не подруга. Она не более чем надоедливый, раздражающий кохай, а также младшая сестра моего друга: Кохината Ироха. "Сэмпай, давай сходим на свидание! Неужели ты думал, что я так скажу?”. Кажется, что по ее венам текут не кровь, а энергетические напитки. Она по-прежнему занимает мою постель и изо всех сил старается соблазнить меня любым способом, который может сыграть ей на руку. Она - девушка, которая постоянно раздражает и раздражает меня. Хотя я весь день занят, ей все равно. И если вам интересно, почему все эти завистливые взгляды направлены на меня, это потому, что Ироха действительно очень популярна. Она почетная ученица в нашей школе с высшими оценками в придачу, и она известна своей добротой и порядочностью ко всем, кого она встречает. "Эй, почему ты так раздражаешь меня, только когда рядом со мной?"
description.es-la: No necesito una relación profunda. No tengo deseo por una novia, y solo requiero un amigo que tenga algún valor para mí. Desde que deseche mi juventud a favor de la eficiencia, hay una persona que sigue entrando al dormitorio de Ooboshi Akiteru. Ella no es mi hermanita o mi amiga. Ella no es nada más que una molestia, una molesta kouhai, así como la hermana pequeña de mi amigo: Kohinata Iroha. "¡Senpai, tengamos una cita! ¿Creíste que diría eso?" En vez de sangre, pareciera que una bebida energética corriera por sus venas. ella sigue ocupando mi cama, y ella da su mejor esfuerzo para seducirme con cualquier método que pueda usar a su favor. ella es una chica que es constantemente molesta y desagradable a mi alrededor. incluso si estoy ocupado todo el día, a ella no le importa. Y en caso de que te estés preguntando por que todas esas miradas envidiosas están dirigidas a mí, es porque Iroha es realmente popular. Ella es una estudiante de honor en nuestra escuela con las mejores calificaciones, y ella es conocida por ser amable y apropiada para cualquiera que ella conozca. Hey ahora, ¿Porque solo eres escandalosa cuando estas alrededor mío?
